title: The Westward movement. Part 5. The Gold rush
creator_credit: Stanley Croner, John W Caughey and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: The 1840 Gold Rushes brought a flood of hardy adventurers to California; people of different races, nationalities, professions, and trades who dramatically advanced the settlement of the west; transformed San Francisco into a metropolis, and provided a great stimulus to commerce in the United States.
